name: Digonnet&Kutas Consulting
goal: Digonnet&Kutas Consulting provides strategic consulting services in the European Union to clients from the agribusiness and bioenergy sectors.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Recast of the Renewable Energy Directive

- 2030 Energy and Climate Package

- Animal welfare
